title: launcher will not launch i tried everything.
body:
launcher will not launch i tried everything. 
shows logo than disappears . 
\new patch has been buggy for me 

list of things I've done

-restart computer
-removed file in folder
-run as administrator

replies.body: I do not recommend removing files as that is likely to cause you more issues than resolve.  Running as admin is a good step, though, as this issue is generally caused by security settings preventing the patcher from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix up this specific issue.
